>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/emails/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Searches for contacts by their names, last names, or emails.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"term":{"description":"The string part of the contact name, last name, or email address","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of strings in the following format: \"Name Last name\" email","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
